channel.title: Difficulty Help

item.title: Difficulty Help
item.dc:creator: @I_Grant_I I Grant I
item.description:
@I_Grant_I wrote:

[center]So I was reading over this tutorial on different experience modes. http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,545304.0.html
And I’m pretty sure I followed the tutorial correctly but, Everytime someone logs in it asks you to select a mode and I checked out the character file to see if it registered and the character file was blank? I think it has something to do with finishedTut. I’m also wondering was is the meaning in the code below.

if (!finishedTut) { getDH().sendDialogues(850, -1); }[/center]

[center]EDIT: No longer needed![/center]

Read full topic
